doc.after: After the establishment of 32 graduate and undergraduate chapters in 1924, Alpha Kappa Alpha Sorority organized chapters according to their regions in the United States and abroad. The BoulÃ© determines the boundaries of the regions.[104] The ten regions are each led by a regional director, where she serves a member of the sorority's Board of Directors. In addition to serving on the sorority's Board of Directors, the regional director also follows guidelines, program targets set by the International President, as well as procedures.[104] Almost two-thirds of the sorority's regional directors have been elected international presidents.[104] A comprehensive list of regions is shown below:
